project_posterfy_desc: Posterfy is a collaborative platform for creating, sharing, and discovering music posters. With an intuitive interface and customization tools, users produce their own designs, explore the community's collection, and interact with each other.
project_posterfy_highlight: Posterfy already has over 600 active users across all continents of the planet, along with an active community on GitHub.
project_oratio_desc: Oratio is an assistive technology solution developed to generate real-time subtitles during in-person classes, connecting a mobile app to desktop software via QR Code and local network. Created to support people with hearing disabilities, the system offers a simple, fast, and accessible experience.
project_oratio_highlight: Oratio is the theme of my undergraduate thesis, originally a project developed in a Software Engineering course. Now with over 1 year of experience in the job market, I took the project as the theme of my work and recreated it in a more modern and robust way.
project_moviemetricks_desc: Moviemetricks is a social media platform where you can share your favorite movies and series, see what your friends are watching, and comment on your opinion about them.
project_moviemetricks_highlight: Developed halfway through my graduation as a final project for a course.
project_syncverse_desc: A browser extension that synchronizes the lyrics of the song you're listening to on your favorite streaming service, using a PIP window to display the lyrics.
project_syncverse_highlight: My first experience producing something out of the ordinary.
project_simpleblockchain_desc: A simple and didactic blockchain in JavaScript, which runs in the console and demonstrates the basic principles of decentralization and immutability.
project_simpleblockchain_highlight: First project developed during my internship in the area.
